mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.`name` store_name, s.canteen_id, s.canteen_name, s.address, s.phone, s.score, s.logoUrl, s.attention, s.sales, s.description, st.tags_id, t.`name` tags_name FROM store s INNER JOIN storetags st ON st.store_id = s.id INNER JOIN tags t ON st.tags_id = t.id
